about_the_game:
Embark on a HeartsLike action-RPG inspired by 1001 Arabian Nights.
Step into the shoes of Faris, a young hero who finds himself in an unfamiliar world, the mystical city of Nuwara. With darkness shrouding the city and the evil Masked King reigning supreme, Faris must restore light and hope. Battle dark creatures, unlock hidden abilities, and rally allies to stop the Masked King and find a way back home. Along the way, encounter memorable characters who will join your quest and help you navigate the vibrant and treacherous landscapes of Nuwara.

Engaging Action-RPG Combat

Experience fast-paced, real-time combat with a variety of weapons and abilities, dynamically switching forms to defeat your enemies.

3D Platforming

Master thrilling 3D platforming challenges as you navigate the diverse terrains of Nuwara, from rooftops to underground tunnels.

Character Progression

Customize Faris's abilities and weapons as you progress, unlocking powerful upgrades and new skills to aid in your quest.

Memorable Characters

Encounter a diverse cast of characters, each with their own backstories and struggles. Help them overcome their pasts and join your fight against the darkness.

Vibrant Environments

Explore the richly detailed and culturally inspired city of Nuwara, filled with vibrant markets, hidden alleys, and grand palaces.

Embark on a HeartsLike action-RPG inspired by 1001 Arabian Nights.
Step into the shoes of Faris, a young hero who finds himself in an unfamiliar world, the mystical city of Nuwara. name: Luminous Nights

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 8.1, 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB) / AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10, 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 (2 GB) / AMD Radeon HD 7970 (3 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a HeartsLike action-RPG inspired by 1001 Arabian Nights. Experience thrilling combat, character progression, and unlock abilities and weapons. Explore vibrant environments, master 3D platforming, and meet memorable characters on your journey to defeat the evil Masked King.
